import{POST_MRP_MASTER_DATA,POST_MRP_MASTER_DATA_SUCCESS,GET_MRP_LIST_PAGE,GET_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,DELETE_MRP_LIST_PAGE,DELETE_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,EDIT_MRP_LIST_PAGE,EDIT_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,UPDATE_MRP_LIST_PAGE,UPDATE_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,POST_GO_BUTTON_FOR_MRP_MASTER,POST_GO_BUTTON_FOR_MRP_MASTER_SUCCESS,DELETE_ID_IN_MASTERPAGE,DELETE_ID_IN_MASTERPAGE_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";// MRP Post API
export var postMRPMasterData=function postMRPMasterData(Data){return{type:POST_MRP_MASTER_DATA,Data:Data};};export var postMRPMasterDataSuccess=function postMRPMasterDataSuccess(data){return{type:POST_MRP_MASTER_DATA_SUCCESS,payload:data};};// Go Button Post API
export var postGoButtonForMRP_Master=function postGoButtonForMRP_Master(data){return{type:POST_GO_BUTTON_FOR_MRP_MASTER,data:data};};export var postGoButtonForMRP_MasterSuccess=function postGoButtonForMRP_MasterSuccess(data){return{type:POST_GO_BUTTON_FOR_MRP_MASTER_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//get listpage api
export var getMRPListPage=function getMRPListPage(){return{type:GET_MRP_LIST_PAGE};};export var getMRPListPageSuccess=function getMRPListPageSuccess(data){return{type:GET_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//delete
export var delete_MRPList=function delete_MRPList(CommonID){return{type:DELETE_MRP_LIST_PAGE,CommonID:CommonID};};export var delete_MRPListSuccess=function delete_MRPListSuccess(data){return{type:DELETE_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};//edit api
export var editMRPList=function editMRPList(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_MRP_LIST_PAGE,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editMRPListSuccess=function editMRPListSuccess(editData){return{type:EDIT_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,payload:editData};};// update api
export var updateMRPList=function updateMRPList(updateData,ID){return{type:UPDATE_MRP_LIST_PAGE,updateData:updateData,ID:ID};};export var updateMRPListSuccess=function updateMRPListSuccess(updateMessage){return{type:UPDATE_MRP_LIST_PAGE_SUCCESS,payload:updateMessage};};// delete api MRP Master Page
export var deleteID_In_MasterPage=function deleteID_In_MasterPage(id){return{type:DELETE_ID_IN_MASTERPAGE,id:id};};export var deleteID_In_MasterPageSuccess=function deleteID_In_MasterPageSuccess(data){return{type:DELETE_ID_IN_MASTERPAGE_SUCCESS,payload:data};};
